alert.note: Alert for Jefferson Davis; Lawrence; Marion (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 11 at 4:54PM CDT until May 11 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Marion County in south central Mississippi... Southeastern Lawrence County in south central Mississippi... Southwestern Jefferson Davis County in south central Mississippi... * Until 545 PM CDT. * At 454 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Oak Vale, or 12 miles southeast of Monticello, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Arm around 510 PM CDT. Progress around 515 PM CDT. Prentiss and Silver Creek around 530 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for south central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
